segments.text: The immediate hazards in this kitchen are truly concerning.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That overflowing water is creating a very slippery surface on the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Anyone could easily slip and fall, especially the children or the oblivious woman.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can just imagine someone hitting their head or breaking a limb.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And the stool the boy is on, it's tilted at such a dangerous angle.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It looks like it could go over at any second, sending him sprawling.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The fact that the woman doesn't notice any of this is infuriating.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's so focused on that plate, utterly blind to the dangers around her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: How can she not feel the water soaking her foot?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This entire situation feels like a disaster waiting for the smallest trigger.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone really needs to intervene before things go completely wrong.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The amount of water pouring out is astounding, a real waste.
segments.speaker: PAR
